name: airbnb-style
description: A mostly reasonable approach to JavaScript.

scripts.preinstall: npm run install:config && npm run install:config:base && npm run install:config:next
scripts.install:config: cd packages/eslint-config-airbnb && npm prune && npm install
scripts.install:config:base: cd packages/eslint-config-airbnb-base && npm prune && npm install
scripts.install:config:next: cd packages/eslint-config-airbnb-next && npm prune && npm install
scripts.test: npm run --silent test:config && npm run --silent test:config:base && npm run --silent test:config:next
scripts.travis: npm run --silent travis:config && npm run --silent travis:config:base && npm run --silent travis:config:next

author: Harrison Shoff <hi@hshoff.com> (https://twitter.com/hshoff)
